nodes.text: Sorry, but I think I'm done for tonight folks.

Our time at the table is done,
The last game of Poobah I won.
No more losses or wins, Mehs, Wumps or Fizbins
So long, friends, the game has been fun.
I vin the last game! Lucky me! This has been so much fun. I cannot believe that semester is over.
Two days from now and we'll all be out of here. It was fun while it lasted.
This semester has been an amazing experience, playing and learning with you all. Thank you for all you've taught me.
Ve clearly need to teach you how to play Poobah better, Thomas. Let this be a lesson to you.
I will be taking the last pot of our Poobah games. It has been a most enlightening and enriching experience to play with you.
And thank you, Senore Sosi, for being so much less skilled a player than you think you are. Your arrogance and vanity have made me much the richer.
You stupid ridiculous son of a...
The last hand of the last Poobah game, and all your booty is now mine! A fine and fitting end to this school year!
You did not win by your skill. It was pure luck...
Well, you lost, Sosi - so you had neither skill nor luck to compensate for your own blind stupidity.
How dare you say that to me, you tawdry runaway from a bawdy house...
I'll gut you like a haddock, you pompous pillock!
Does this mean I won the last hand of Poobah for the year? It's been so much fun. It has taught me a lot about Disbarred Bards.
I hope it taught you something about Bard bards, too.
Yeah, like always carry some cotton to put in your ears when a bard is around...
Naturally, I win this last Poobah hand. You losers should never have dared to play against my superior skill. Poobah proves that a fool and his money are soon parted.
Funny how when you win, it's all about skill, and when you lose, it's all about bad luck. Well get this - the only reason you won is because of dumb luck.
You lost, MacMichael. Luck is only dumb when it is around you.
Why you pompous, arrogant...
Hey, I won the very last Poobah match! I'd like to thank all of you for the loads of lovely Lyra you've let me take from you over the course of these games.
You may have lost this game, but your money is going to a worthy cause. Your contributions to the "Make Shawn Rich" retirement fund are greatly appreciated.
Nobody likes a sore winner, O'Conner.
Sorry, but I think I'm done for tonight folks.
Good golly, Miss Molly - you mean I won? Great Balls of Fire!
P-p-p-poker face... A little gambling is fun when you're with me...
You gotta know when to fold'em... Know when to walk away, and know when to run... So I'm just going to walk away right now.
You should know by now better than to bet against me.
There, the last hand is to me. I von!
I vin the last hand again! I am very lucky... or very, very good at Poobah.
What do you know? It seems that the last hand is mine. I must be very lucky.
Ah, I have the last pot of the evening. I must commend you all for your brilliant card play. I never could have won without you.
How very good of you to let me take this last hand of the night. I look forward to our next Poobah session. This was most entertaining.
Well, mateys, the last of your treasure is mine tonight, and a fine haul it is.
There we have it, the last hand goes to me. Lady luck sailed at my side.
That's it, people - games over, and I claim your Lyra. It's been fun.
I won? That was the last hand and I'm finally starting to understand this game.
Looks like I won this time. We'll have to play this again. I can see now why you all enjoy the game.
That's it, I win. There's a lot of subtlety to this game, isn't there? I look forward to our next Poobah session.
And there it is, I've won this game. Was there any doubt?
That's it, this game is mine. You losers have no one to blame but yourselves.
Last hand goes to me, as well it should. The rest of you should learn that you can't outdo me.
That's the last hand? What a shame. I was just starting to take all your money. Oh well, there's always next time.
And my winning hand will conclude today's Poobah game. I hope you all bring more money to the next game - I can always use the spare change.
Thank you all for making my coin purse a little fatter. It's been fun. I look forward to playing you all next time.
Attention everyone! It is now curfew time. I expect all of you to return to your dorm rooms immediately. No exceptions.
